name: Shipsnatcher (GMTK21)
description:
SHIPSNATCHER is a game about surviving for as long as possible! Use the gravity lasso to take control of the enemy and form a crew. Now bound together, fight, gain new weapons, and achieve the highest wave possible!

Your lassos recharge every 5 waves. At that point enemies will level up and come equipped with new weapons. 

Different colors of ships have different stats:

Battleships (purple): average stats all around.

Destroyers (red): High damage and fast cooldowns, but low health.

Frigate (yellow): High damage and health but very slow cooldowns.

Scout (green): very fast cooldowns but low health and damage.

Runs best in full screen!

Controls:

WASD to move

LMB to fire the weapon on ship 1

RMB to fire the weapon on ship 2

Space to fire the weapon on ship 3

Credits:

Programming by Apsel

Art by ShrimpPongo

Music by Oblidivm / @oblidivm and YD

Title Font by Ænigma
